text: Castiglione d'Intelvi was a comune in the Province of Como in the Lombardy region in Italy. On 1 January 2018, the former municipalities of Casasco d'Intelvi, Castiglione d'Intelvi and San Fedele Intelvi merged to form the new municipality of Centro Valle Intelvi. Category:Former municipalities of Como
title: Castiglione d'Intelvi
